title: Breakingviews TV: M&A flavor flay
text:
Breakingviews TV: M&A flavor flay 6:02pm BST - 03:42
Antony Currie and Jennifer Saba sniff the air around IFF’s $7 bln offer for natural-ingredients firm Frutarom and find a strange aroma. The value of cost cuts more than cover the premium – but a 5 pct return on investment doesn’t pass the smell test.Company
